text: Tunisia was first at the Olympic Games in 1960. They have been in every Summer Olympic Games since then, except the American-led boycott of the 1980 Summer Olympics. Tunisia has never been in the Winter Olympic Games. The National Olympic Committee for Tunisia was formed in 1957. ==List of medalists== Medal Name Games Sport Event 1964 Tokyo Athletics Men's 10000 metres 1964 Tokyo Boxing Men's light welterweight 1968 Mexico Athletics Men's 5000 metres 1968 Mexico Athletics Men's 10000 metres 1972 Munich Athletics Men's 5000 metres 1996 Atlanta Boxing Men's light welterweight 2008 Beijing Swimming Men's 1500 metre freestyle 2012 London Swimming Men's 1500 m freestyle 2012 London Athletics Women's 3000 m steeplechase 2012 London Swimming Men's 10 km marathon ==Related pages== * List of IOC country codes ==References== ==Other websites== * * Tunisia profile at London2012.com Category:Nations at the Olympics Category:National sports teams of Tunisia
title: Tunisia at the Olympics
